transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Yeah hi Sachin good afternoon.

Customer: Hi aapka aawaz nahi aa raha hai kya hua mobile network sound baat kar raha tha.

Executive: Ji ji bataiye boliye boliye.

Customer: Hello kya hua aapke aap

Executive: Hello sir maine aapko Saturday maine bataya na tha sir aapko.

Customer: Are sir ji teen din ho gaye ek bhi by lead aisa nahi aa raha hai product listed aisa sir khali ek do kilo ho sakta hai sir traffic traffic ki vajah se ho sakta hai sir but already to maine aapse do din pehle bhi feedback liya tha.

Executive: Teen din sir maine aapko bataya ki office kya keh rahe hai malum hai sir malum hai maine already Saturday mein

Customer: Ji ji agar main feedback nahi dalta to aap bhi call nahi karte right.

Executive: Sir maine aapko call nahi kar raha tha.

Customer: Nahi nahi kal abhi aaj to Monday hai na aaj to morning abhi half day ho gaya.

Executive: Sir morning mein aate hue maine aapko update suna tha main ka wait kar raha tha ka response dekh raha tha ki kaisa kya hai lekin aap nahi aa raha hai product listed aap hi dekhiye mera India mart ka sab dekhiye aap data sab by lead dekhiye.

Customer: Hmm hmm.

Customer: Maine maine aapse baat ki thi WhatsApp pe message dala tha.

Executive: Sir aap do ghante do ghante pehle sir do ghante pehle Thane Maharashtra se putti ka inquiry aaya tha.

Customer: Hmm epoxy putti ka.

Executive: Nahi aaya mujhe.

Executive: Sir agar koi inquiries ho raha hai sir aapke profile pe.

Customer: Kahan pe dikha hai ek minute.

Executive: TCS ke plastic steel five minute karke aaya hai pehle putti SF epoxy putti ke andar aaya hai 90 piece ka requirement hai usme 0.5 kg packaging mein puri selling ke liye karke.

Customer: Nahi.

Executive: Type of requirement quarterly half yearly annual dala hai usne.

Customer: Wo to liya hai maine.

Executive: Fir ek bar fourth rock APW 100 epoxy floor coating and dealer ka dekhenge to 400 square feet ka hai computer se mila dunga.

Customer: Floor coating ka bhi nahi chahiye sir ji ye Pune mein ke jo rehte hai na wo bhi lete hai baki ke aur jagah se hota hai wo coating services mangte hai.

Executive: Hmm hmm wo services hum sun sun sun sun art resin ka.

Customer: Haan coating services ka hai na wo unko unke jagah pe ja ke coating karwana ka kam rehta hai wo coating ka ye apna kam nahi hai coating ka apna apna jo hai wo manufacturing chemical ka.

Executive: To Nagpur local mein to kar sakte hai na Nagpur jaise Nagpur epoxy floor coating ka Nagpur Maharashtra ka inquiry available hai 300 square feet ka.

Customer: 25 se 10 liter floor coating ka nikalne wala hu wo main wo main product hi nikalne wala hu.

Executive: Kya isme dalne wale hai kya.

Customer: Haan nikalne wala hu main dekh thode din dekhunga main aur wo nikal dunga main Pune ka to do ek do mahine se ek bhi nahi aaya uska floor coating wo to aata hi nahi hai aur baki ke product to maine maine aapko jo WhatsApp pe bej diye the wo to last week two week se nahi aa raha hai aap hi dekh check kar lijiye maine aapse baat kiya tha coating compound ka aur baki ke product

Executive: Epoxy doming epoxy doming to epoxy doming to naya product add hua hai na.

Customer: Haan wo to uska bhi nahi aaya ek aaya tha wo bhi le liya subah.

Executive: Haan to wo to naya product add hua hai to uska usse dekhiye thoda sa purana hoega lead generate ho jayega uska jo bhi inquiry aata hai na low quality ka chahe jo bhi quality ka.

Customer: Haan aap usko ek bar na aapka jo aapka side se jo hai na catalog modification na disable kiya hua hai.

Customer: Haan wo karo kya on haan usko ek usko ek bar enable kar dijiye.

Executive: Theek hai enable karta hu aap dekhiye tab tak main India mart ka wo product abhi update karunga main aur photo video dal dunga video nahi hai na isme ka jo hai na

Executive: Ji catalog ko jo disable karke disable kar dete hai na isko enable hi rehne dijiye samjhe kyuki aap hume kuch details vagera bhejenge na tab kuch kar nahi payenge fir usme.

Customer: Theek hai abhi karta hu ek minute.

Executive: Samjhe usko enable kar dijiye.

Customer: Haan karta hu main fir se call karta hu abhi guest aaya abhi abhi.

Executive: Ji ji ji ji so karke na aata hu tab tak.
summary:
Concerns:

- No buyleads in the last three days.

- No inquiries for epoxy putty.

- No leads for floor coating products.

- Other products are not generating leads.

- Catalog modification is disabled.



Resolution:

- Executive checked for epoxy putty inquiries.

- Executive offered to connect with computer for floor coating.

- Executive informed customer about enabling catalog modification.

- Executive will update product details and photos.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will enable catalog modification.

- Customer will call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, epoxy, floor coating, inquiries
